segments.text: Excuse me , professor . I need to go home now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What exactly seems to be the matter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that you should go to the Student Health Center ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I already have some medicine at home if I could just get there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need someone to drive you home ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , but the bus stops right at my house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , go home and rest up . Make sure you check the website for your assignments .
segments.speaker: S2
